content: The Venom Daoist is an enemy character who you will encounter during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong, and will need to defeat twice both in the Webbed Hollow and the Temple of Yellow Flowers. By doing so, you can unlock a secret area to explore.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
The Venom Daoist is an enemy character who you will encounter during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong, and will need to defeat twice both in the Webbed Hollow and the Temple of Yellow Flowers. By doing so, you can unlock a secret area to explore.
